div.div: Results for 37 populations of E. henryi based on the analysis of 457 AFLP loci.
div.p: (A) Histogram of the baps assignment test for 37 populations (394 individuals) ( K = 9). Each vertical bar represents an individual. Southern and northern cpDNA lineages contain 9 and 1 AFLP clusters, respectively. Population codes are shown above the bar. (B) Spatial clustering of 37 populations in baps ( K = 9). Each polygon represents one population corresponding to the histogram above, and colours of polygons indicate clusters. (C) PCoA for 37 populations (394 individuals). Percentages of total variance explained by the first three coordinates are shown on the respective axes.
